mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_payment(reserve_id, amount, payment_kind, tid, payment_date, state, created_at) values(#{reserveId},#{amount},#{paymentKind},#{tid},now(),#{state},now());
mapper.select: SELECT p.payment_id, p.amount, p.tid, p.created_at, p.state, r.reserve_id, ls.session_date , l.title, lp.img, ps.name, b.business_name FROM tb_payment p JOIN tb_reserve r ON p.reserve_id = r.reserve_id JOIN tb_lecture_session ls ON r.lecture_session_id = ls.lecture_session_id JOIN tb_lecture l ON ls.lecture_id = l.lecture_id LEFT JOIN tb_lecture_photo lp ON l.lecture_id = lp.lecture_id JOIN tb_person ps ON l.user_id = ps.user_id LEFT JOIN tb_business b ON l.user_id = b.user_id WHERE p.payment_id = #{paymentId};
SELECT img FROM adayoflearning.tb_lecture_photo WHERE is_thumbnail = 1 AND lecture_id=(SELECT lecture_id FROM tb_lecture_session WHERE lecture_session_id = #{lectureSessionId});
